contents.text: Welcome to Streak CRM, the only CRM built entirely within Gmail to help you close deals, manage partnerships, and track support without ever leaving your inbox.
To talk to our sales team for deal management, press 1.
For new deal setup and pipeline configuration, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales representative.

navigationGoals: Set up a new sales pipeline in Streak CRM for an upcoming client deal.
I need to configure a new sales pipeline in Streak for my veteran-owned consulting business.
I need to provision a new sales pipeline in Streak CRM within Gmail.
Please help me set up a new deal pipeline in my email CRM.
I want to set up a new deal pipeline to track research collaboration offers.

contents.text: To inquire about an existing deal or update your pipeline, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to your account manager.

navigationGoals: Get an update on my current deal status and adjust its pipeline stage.
I want to follow up on the deal I submitted last week and update its stage in my pipeline.
I need to update an existing deal’s stage and refresh my pipeline data.
Please let me check on my current deal and update its details.
I need to get an update on my existing deal and adjust its stage accordingly.

contents.text: For support issues or partnership inquiries, press 2.
For partnership opportunities and integrations, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships team.

navigationGoals: Explore partnership integration options for our business with Streak CRM.
I’m interested in partnering Streak with my nonprofit veteran support network.
I want to discuss integrating Streak CRM with our internal API for a partnership.
Please tell me about integrating a new partner service with my account.
I’d like to explore integration options for connecting Streak CRM with my experiment-tracking software.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our support specialist.

navigationGoals: Resolve a technical issue with Streak CRM functionality in Gmail.
I’m experiencing sync errors in the Gmail extension and need technical assistance.
I’m experiencing sync errors with the Gmail extension and need troubleshooting support.
Please help me troubleshoot a technical issue I’m having with the CRM.
I need help troubleshooting an issue with email syncing in Streak CRM.
